name: Gravity Pinball
description:
The beautiful marbles draw a beautiful trajectory in the round frame
In the game, you need to use inertia to coordinate with the acceleration of gravity. Let the marbles enter the small white circle to unlock the larger map.
Pay attention to the various obstacles on the map and use your mind to climb over them!
Try to get all the stars on the map and pass all the levels perfectly!

***How to play***

-The left and right keys control the direction of the marbles. When the maximum height is reached each time, let go and let the marbles fall freely, and cooperate with the direction keys to make the marbles roll faster and faster.
- Keep repeating this operation to make the marbles fly higher until the marbles enter the circle!
